segments.text: I notice how the light filters through the window, making everything appear so ordinary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But within this normalcy, I see chaos preparing to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands clueless, her focus solely on the plate she’s drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it amusing that the children think they can get away with such mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy reaches into the jar, and I can’t help but chuckle at his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the thought of the stool tipping over makes me wince.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a fragile balance between joy and disaster, all happening in one small kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
